EmailTemplate.description: Notify presenter that transaction is currently in the review status
EmailTemplate.name: CH Review Status
EmailTemplate.subject: Signing complete for {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}({!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}) Ref: FE{!Transaction__c.Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Companies House signing complete
Request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}
Your request to close {!Transaction__c.CompanyName__c}({!Transaction__c.CompanyNumber__c}) whose registered office address is {!Transaction__c.CompanyAddress1__c} {!Transaction__c.CompanyPostCode__c} has been approved and signed by the required directors and/or anyone authorised to act on their behalf. You will need to review, complete and submit the reqest to close. Your reference number for any future enquiries is FE{!Transaction__c.Id}.
Review, complete and submit the request to close.
What happens next
You will need to review, complete and submit the request to close using the link above.
Contact Centre tel +44 (0)303 1234 500 or email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk.
This email was sent from a notification-only email address which cannot accept incoming mail. Please do not reply directly to this message.
